text: Jack and the lady are very attentive and patience. Service is fast, managed to get my new specs within 30mins. Would recommend this shop to others (no overselling, nice selection of range, approachable staff).

My to go Spec shop. Their service is superb. Professional, Friendly & nice. My gal did e control deg glasses frm them so far so gd. My contact lens + specs also frm them. Recommended my family n frens to them too.

Very friendly staff (Jack and HY)! They were very patient with us and gave us good advice. We got a new pair of glasses with astig within an hour. Environment is very welcoming and theres lots of variety of frames and contact lenses to choose from.
Very good and professional..  Hong Yu is very helpful and patient..  I made 2 sets and both sets were very good.  Will introduce my friends
Staff super professional and friendly. Did my first spectacles here with reasonable price. Super recommend !
